Data Fields

gapAdvDataToken_t Struct Reference
[BLE GAP Constants and Structures]

#include <gap.h>

Data Fields

uint8 adType

uint8 attrLen
 Number of bytes in the attribute data.
uint8 * pAttrData
 pointer to Attribute data

Detailed Description

GAP Advertisement/Scan Response Data Token - These data items are stored as low byte first (OTA format). The data space for these items are passed in and maintained by the calling application
